content: As an AI language model, I do not have the ability to provide a current and specific information as to what tactics teams have been using in a tournament, hence I cannot provide a specific answer. However, tactics used by teams in the tournament may vary from game to game, and it depends on each team's style of play and the skills of their players. Some teams may focus on attacking through the middle of the pitch, while others may prefer to play out wide and cross the ball into the box. Defensively, some teams may choose to press high up the pitch to disrupt their opponent's possession, while others may opt to sit back and defend deep to counter their opponent's attacking threat. There is no one "most effective" tactic as it depends on multiple factors including the opposition team's strategy and the overall performance of the team on the day.
